title: Slope of a tangent line at a specified point

content.question: Line L is tangent to the graph of <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>x</mi> </msup> </mrow> </math> at the point <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mo>,</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>k</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math>. What is the positive value of <math> <mi>k</mi> </math> for which the y-intercept of L is <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> ?

choices.label: There is no such value of <math> <mi>k</mi> </math>.
